contexts.context: ...To restore magicka for spellcasting, combine comberry and <mark>frost</mark> salts. comberry is a bitter berry, used...
.... It grows mainly in the Ascadian Isles. <mark>frost</mark> salts, by contrast, are rare and expensive...
...and expensive. These crystalline compounds precipitate from elemental <mark>frost</mark> in solution. Such residues may be collected from...
...Such residues may be collected from the remains of <mark>frost</mark> atronachs that have been banished from the mortal plane...
...He learned how to shrug off the effects of <mark>frost</mark>, poison, fire, and charges of lightning...
